name: AWS API Gateway
description: The Sumo Logic App for AWS API Gateway provides visibility into your Amazon APIGateway Service Metrics collected via a CloudWatch Metrics Source. The App’s Dashboards provide preconfigured searches and filters that allow you to monitor your API Gateway Infrastructure.

panels.title: API Requests By API Name Today, Yesterday, Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by region
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by region | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by entity | timeshift 7d

panels.title: API Requests By Region Today, Yesterday, and Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by region
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by region | timeshift 7d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by region | timeshift 7d

panels.title: Latency
panels.text: Time in between API Gateway receives request from client and returns response to the client

panels.title: ‎Integration Latency
panels.text: Time in between API Gateway relays request to backend and receives response from backend

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Latency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | avg by region
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Latency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | avg by entity
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IntegrationLatency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | avg by region

Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheHitCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | avg by region
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheMissCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | avg by region

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by Region
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by Region | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by entity | timeshift 7d

panels.title: API Requests By Region Today, Yesterday, Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by Region
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by Region | timeshift 7d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} | sum by Region | timeshift 7d

$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and Region matches "{{region}}"
| count by event_name
| sort by _count, event_name asc

$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and Region matches "{{region}}"
| timeslice 1h
| count as eventCount by _timeslice, event_name
| transpose row _timeslice column event_name

$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and Region matches "{{region}}"
| count by event_name, Region
| transpose row Region column event_name

$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com"  and Region matches "{{region}}"
| timeslice 5m
| count by Region, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column Region

$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and Region matches "{{region}}"
| timeslice 5m
| count by event_name, user_agent
| transpose row event_name column user_agent

panels.title: Event Name by Recipient Account ID

queries.queryString:
$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and Region matches "{{region}}"
| timeslice 1h
| count by event_name, accountId
| transpose row event_name column accountId

$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and Region matches "{{region}}" and !isEmpty(errorCode)
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code

$$logsrc "\"eventSource\":\"apigateway.amazonaws.com\"" !errorCode account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "responseElements", "sourceIPAddress", "errorCode", "errorMessage" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, accountId1, userIdentity, requestParameters, responseElements, src_ip, errorCode, errorMessage nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "accountId" as  accountId2 nodrop | json field=requestParameters "basePath", "domainName" as basePath, domainName nodrop | json field=responseElements "name" as ApiName nodrop // CreateRestApi, ImportRestApi, UpdateRestApi provides ApiName
| if (!isEmpty(accountId1), accountId1, accountId2) as accountId
| where event_source = "apigateway.amazonaws.com" and Region matches "{{region}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Count Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by method
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=4XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by method
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=5XXError Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}}  method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by method
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by entity, method | count
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by resource | count
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=count statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | sum by entity, method, resource
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheHitCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by entity
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=CacheMissCount statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by entity
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Latency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by entity
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IntegrationLatency statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} stage={{stage}} method={{method}} resource={{resource}} | avg by entity

panels.title: Note
panels.text: This dashboard works on detailed CloudWatch metrics which needs to be explicitly enabled. You can do this in the console by selecting "Enable CloudWatch Metrics" under a stage Settings tab. Alternatively, you can call the update-stage AWS CLI command to update the metricsEnabled property to true.
